name: Libatoms.GitHub.io
tagline: Public web site for QUIP and friends
body:
# libAtoms

These are the public webpages for the [libAtoms](https://github.com/libAtoms) GitHub organisation.

## Documentation Webpages

- [QUIP and quippy](http://libatoms.github.io/QUIP) - General-purpose library for Quantum Mechanics and Interatomic Potentials
- [matscipy](http://libatoms.github.io/QUIP) - Python materials science tools

## GitHub Repositories

- [QUIP](https://github.com/libAtoms/QUIP)
- [matscipy](https://github.com/libAtoms/matscipy)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
